com.epoch.db

Class ImageRW

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.db.DBCommon
      • com.epoch.db.ImageRW
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorConstants

    public final class ImageRW
extends DBCommon
implements AuthorConstants
    Contains methods to read and write images (and movies).

      • addImage

        void addImage(int imageId,
              String newLocation)
       throws SQLException
        Writes an image's location to the database and changes its old filename to a new one.
        Parameters:
        imageId - unique ID of this image
        newLocation - name of permanent file containing the image relative to the application root
        Throws:
        SQLException - if there's a problem writing to the database

      • addImage

        void addImage(int imageId,
              String currentLocation,
              String newLocation)
       throws SQLException,
              FileNotFoundException,
              IOException
        Writes an image's location to the database and changes its old filename to a new one.
        Parameters:
        imageId - unique ID of this image
        currentLocation - name of temporary file containing the image relative to the application root
        newLocation - name of permanent file containing the image relative to the application root
        Throws:
        SQLException - if there's a problem writing to the database
        FileNotFoundException - if the file isn't at the given location
        IOException - if the file can't be written

      • renameImageFile

        static void renameImageFile(String currentLocation,
                            String newLocation)
                     throws FileNotFoundException,
                            IOException
        Renames a file; if rename operation fails, copies the file and deletes the original.
        Parameters:
        currentLocation - current location of the file relative to app root
        newLocation - new location of the file relative to app root
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if the file isn't at the location
        IOException - if the files can't be read or written

                      throws FileNotFoundException,
                             IOException,
                             SQLException
        Renames files.
        Parameters:
        con - database connection
        renameImages - list of old and new file names
        Throws:
        SQLException - if there's a problem reading the database
        FileNotFoundException - if the files aren't at the locations
        IOException - if the files can't be read or written

      • deleteImages

        List<String> deleteImages(SQLWithQMarks imgsSql_vals)
                   throws SQLException
        Deletes images from a table and, if the connection is set to autocommit, the disk.
        Parameters:
        imgsSql_vals - SQL for selecting the images to delete, not already parenthesized, and values to substitute for question marks in the SQL
        Returns:
        names of files that have been deleted from disk or that need to be deleted from disk after commit is complete
        Throws:
        SQLException - if there's a problem writing to the database

      • deleteImagesFromDisk

        public void deleteImagesFromDisk(String startName)
        Deletes from disk all files in the figures directory whose names start with a pattern. Code reference: http://www.coderanch.com/t/278095//java/Wildcard-delete-File-Object.
        Parameters:
        startName - the beginning of the name of the files to be deleted
